entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 09:32 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:18 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 through mainland inlets and valleys this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 06:18 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:18 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
